mapper.select: select c.COLUMN_NAME,c.COLUMN_TYPE,c.COLUMN_COMMENT from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS c where c.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} and c.TABLE_SCHEMA = #{dbName}
mapper.sql: from sys_data_privil a inner join sys_data_role_privil b on a.DATA_PRIVIL_ID = b.DATA_PRIVIL_ID inner join sys_data_role c on b.DATA_ROLE_ID = c.DATA_ROLE_ID
mapper.select:
select c.DATA_ROLE_ID, c.NAME as roleName, c.STATUS, a.DATA_PRIVIL_ID, a.TABLE_CODE, a.TABLE_NAME, a.COLUMN_CODE, a.COLUMN_NAME, a.ROLE
and c.NAME like concat('%',#{roleName},'%') and a.TABLE_CODE like concat('%',#{tableName},'%')

select count(*)
and c.NAME like concat('%',#{roleName},'%') and a.TABLE_CODE like concat('%',#{tableName},'%')
limit 1
select s.ROLE from sys_data_privil s where s.TABLE_CODE =#{tableName} and s.COLUMN_CODE = #{column}
select count(*) cnt ,COLUMN_CODE,s.ROLE from sys_data_privil s where s.TABLE_CODE = #{tableName} group by s.COLUMN_CODE having count(*) =1;
